channel.title: cold email on Email Zipcode
channel.description: Recent content in cold email on Email Zipcode

item.title: Cold Email Best Practices
item.description: Are you having a hard time coming up with a plan to cold email to possible clients? Are your email campaigns falling flat and not getting any responses? You are not alone. Only about 18% of cold emails were opened in 2021. In this blog, we will talk about the best practices for cold emailing. Are you ready to sharpen your skills and plan some cold emails? Read on to learn more.
